scripts.build: node scripts/logEnvironment.js && node scripts/validateGallery.js && node scripts/generateResourcesContent.js && if [ "$VERCEL_ENV" = "production" ]; then node scripts/enrichResourcesWithAI.js; fi && if [ "$VERCEL_ENV" != "production" ]; then node scripts/fixGalleryKV.js; fi && node scripts/runGalleryUpdate.js
